data.title: What is Eminem's ex Kimberly Scott doing now?
data.meta_description: Eminem recently gushed over his daughter Hailie, whom he shares with ex-wife Kim Scott. Who is Kim and what is she doing now?
data.text:
Eminem warmed hearts across the world this week when he admitted his proudest achievement is ‘being a father.’

Which is a no feat, considering the rapper is one of the best-selling rappers of the 2000s and is the best-selling hip hop artist of all time.

During an appearance on Mike Tyson’s Hot Boxin’ podcast, Eminem gushed over how proud he is of his daughter.

‘Hailie is 23, no babies, she has a boyfriend, but she’s doing good, she’s made me proud for sure, she’s graduated from college,’ Em told the retired boxer.

He later concluded: ‘So when I think about my accomplishments that’s probably the thing I’m the most proud of is that – is being able to raise kids.’

Eminem shares daughter Hailie Mathers with his ex-wife Kimberly Scott, who is probably best known for featuring regularly in the lyrics of the rapper’s early hits.

So, who is Kim Scott and what is she doing now?

Kim Scott, formerly Kim Mathers, was born in 1975 in Warren, Michigan, and first met Eminem in 1987 when they were both teenagers.

They embarked on a rocky relationship which saw them marry and divorce twice before finally parting ways in 2006.

They married from 1999 to 2001, before divorcing and remarrying in 2016, with their second marriage only lasting a few months.

In 2000, Eminem released Kim, where he spat some pretty slamming lyrics about his wife at the time, claiming she had cheated on him.

The track also alluded to domestic violence, with the lyrics portraying Eminem as beating up his unfaithful wife, even killing her.

She later filed a suit against the star for $10 million in compensation for ‘the intentional infliction of emotional distress.’

They co-parent daughter Hailie, who was born on 25 December 1995.

What is Kim Scott doing now?

Since their second divorce, Kim, 45,has laid relatively low, last speaking publicly in 2015.

In 2015 she was involved in a car accident in Shelby Township Michigan, which she later revealed was a suicide attempt.

She told Detroit-based radio show Mojo in the Morning about the accident, where she revealed: ‘I sat at the end of a road where I knew that no one else but myself would get hurt. Yes, I drank, I took pills, I hit the gas and aimed for a pole.’

She went on to say she was getting help and that she had been sober for ten years, adding that she was raising her kids, including her son with autism.

She praised Eminem, confirming there is no longer beef between the pair.

‘He has been real supportive. We are really close friends. We are just trying to raise our kids together and make it as normal for them as possible,’ she said.

The pair have three children together in total, Hailie their biological child, as well as Whitney, Kim’s daughter whom Eminem adopted, and Alaina, the daughter of Kim’s late twin sister, whom they also adopted.

Whitney, 17,is Kim’s daughter from a previous relationship whereas Alaina, 26, is Kim’s sister Dawn’s daughter.Dawn passed away in 2016.

While the girls are active on social media, they have refrained from posting images of their mother.

Kim also has a son called Parker but it’s understood Eminem is not his legal guardian.
